dublinCore.dc:title: 119 S1643 IS: Protecting Access to Ground Ambulance Medical Services Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Ms. Cortez Masto (for herself, Ms. Collins, Mr. Cassidy, Mr. Welch, Mrs. Capito, and Mr. Merkley) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance

form.official-title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to protect patient access to ground ambulance services under the Medicare program.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Protecting Access to Ground Ambulance Medical Services Act of 2025.

section.header: Protecting patient access to Medicare ground ambulance services

subsection.text: Section 1834(l)(12)(A) of the Social Security Act (42 U.S.C. 1395m(l)(12)(A)) is amended—

paragraph.text: in the first sentence, by striking October 1, 2025 and inserting January 1, 2028; and
by adding at the end the following new sentence: In the case of services furnished on or after October 1, 2025, and before January 1, 2028, such percent increase shall be 26.7 percent..

subsection.text: Section 1834(l)(13)(A) of the Social Security Act (42 U.S.C. 1395m(l)(13)(A)) is amended—

paragraph.text: in the matter preceding clause (i), by striking October 1, 2025 and inserting January 1, 2028;
in clause (i), by inserting , or 4.3 percent if such service is furnished on or after October 1, 2025, and before January 1, 2028 after 2025; and
in clause (ii), by inserting , or 3.4 percent if such service is furnished on or after October 1, 2025, and before January 1, 2028 after 2025.
